model.Map.Occupiable

Interface Occupiable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DestTile, Tile

    public interface Occupiable
    An interface for objects which can be occupied by crates or the player

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<Occupant> getOccupant() 
      void removeOccupant()
      Removes the occupant from the Occupiable instance, or does nothing if it's not occupied
      void setOccupant(Occupant o) 

    • Method Detail

      • getOccupant

        java.util.Optional<Occupant> getOccupant()
        Returns:
        Returns the Optional instance potentially bearing an Occupant

      • setOccupant

        void setOccupant(Occupant o)
        Parameters:
        o - The occupant to set in this position. Ignores whether or not the Occupiable instance is occupied or not.

      • removeOccupant

        void removeOccupant()
        Removes the occupant from the Occupiable instance, or does nothing if it's not occupied
